oai_dc:dc.dc:title: RISK ASSESSMENT IN EU ORGANIC CERTIFICATION SYSTEM: A SYSTEMATIC LITERATURE REVIEW
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gambelli, Danilo
Solfanelli, Francesco
Zanoli, Raffaele
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper gives an overview of the recent studies on risk-based inspection in EU organic certification systems with the aim to evaluate the most relevant risk factors or farm types that are more likely associated with non-compliances. We have conducted a systematic revision of the literature regarding risk based certification in EU organic farming. Our analysis provide a new systematic approach yielding a structured qualitative summary of the results of the publications.
